/usr/local/bin/clang++ -O3 -DNDEBUG -rdynamic CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/src/graphic.cpp.o CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/src/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/testCUDA.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o testCUDA   -L/usr/local/cuda-11/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  libcore.a /usr/lib64/libfreetype.so /usr/lib64/libSDL2.so /usr/lib64/libGLX.so /usr/lib64/libOpenGL.so -ldl -lpthread -lmpi -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl -lstdc++ -lgcc_s -lgcc -lgcc_s -lgcc
